verses.text: \w Plead|strong="H7378"\w* \add my cause\add*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, with them that \w strive|strong="H3401"\w* with me: \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* against them that \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* against me.
Take \w hold|strong="H2388"\w* of \w shield|strong="H4043"\w* and \w buckler|strong="H6793"\w*, and stand \w up|strong="H6965"\w* for mine \w help|strong="H5833"\w*.

Draw \w out|strong="H7324"\w* also the \w spear|strong="H2595"\w*, and \w stop|strong="H5462"\w* \add the way\add* \w against|strong="H7125"\w* them that \w persecute|strong="H7291"\w* me: \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, I \add am\add* thy \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*.

Let them be \w confounded|strong="H0954"\w* and put to \w shame|strong="H3637"\w* that \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* after my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*: let them be \w turned|strong="H5472"\w* \w back|strong="H0268"\w* and brought to \w confusion|strong="H2659"\w* that \w devise|strong="H2803"\w* my \w hurt|strong="H7451"\w*.

Let them be as \w chaff|strong="H4671"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*: and let the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w chase|strong="H1760"\w* \add them\add*.

Let their \w way|strong="H1870"\w* be \w dark|strong="H2822"\w* and \w slippery|strong="H2519"\w*: and let the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w persecute|strong="H7291"\w* them.\f + \fr 35.6 \ft dark…: Heb. darkness and slipperiness\f*

For without \w cause|strong="H2600"\w* have they \w hid|strong="H2934"\w* for me their \w net|strong="H7568"\w* \add in\add* a \w pit|strong="H7845"\w*, \add which\add* without \w cause|strong="H2600"\w* they have \w digged|strong="H2658"\w* for my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.

Let \w destruction|strong="H7722"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* upon him at \w unawares|strong="H3045"\w*; and let his \w net|strong="H7568"\w* that he hath \w hid|strong="H2934"\w* \w catch|strong="H3920"\w* himself: into that very \w destruction|strong="H7722"\w* let him \w fall|strong="H5307"\w*.\f + \fr 35.8 \ft at…: Heb. which he knoweth not of\f*
And my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* shall be \w joyful|strong="H1523"\w* in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: it shall \w rejoice|strong="H7797"\w* in his \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*.

All my \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, who \add is\add* like unto thee, which \w deliverest|strong="H5337"\w* the \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* from him that is too \w strong|strong="H2389"\w* for him, yea, the \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* and the \w needy|strong="H0034"\w* from him that \w spoileth|strong="H1497"\w* him?

\w False|strong="H2555"\w* \w witnesses|strong="H5707"\w* did rise \w up|strong="H6965"\w*; they laid to my \w charge|strong="H7592"\w* \add things\add* that I \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* not.\f + \fr 35.11 \ft False…: Heb. Witnesses of wrong\f*\f + \fr 35.11 \ft they…: Heb. they asked me\f*

They \w rewarded|strong="H7999"\w* me \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* for \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \add to\add* the \w spoiling|strong="H7908"\w* of my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.\f + \fr 35.12 \ft spoiling: Heb. depriving\f*

But as for me, when they were \w sick|strong="H2470"\w*, my \w clothing|strong="H3830"\w* \add was\add* \w sackcloth|strong="H8242"\w*: I \w humbled|strong="H6031"\w* my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* with \w fasting|strong="H6685"\w*; and my \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* into mine own \w bosom|strong="H2436"\w*.\f + \fr 35.13 \ft humbled: or, afflicted\f*

I \w behaved|strong="H1980"\w* myself as though \add he had been\add* my \w friend|strong="H7453"\w* \add or\add* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*: I bowed \w down|strong="H7817"\w* \w heavily|strong="H6937"\w*, as one that \w mourneth|strong="H0057"\w* \add for his\add* \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*.\f + \fr 35.14 \ft behaved myself: Heb. walked\f*\f + \fr 35.14 \ft as though…: Heb. as a friend, as a brother to me\f*

But in mine \w adversity|strong="H6761"\w* they \w rejoiced|strong="H8055"\w*, and gathered themselves \w together|strong="H0622"\w*: \add yea\add*, the \w abjects|strong="H5222"\w* gathered themselves \w together|strong="H0622"\w* against me, and I \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \add it\add* not; they did \w tear|strong="H7167"\w* \add me\add*, and \w ceased|strong="H1826"\w* not:\f + \fr 35.15 \ft adversity: Heb. halting\f*
With \w hypocritical|strong="H2611"\w* \w mockers|strong="H3934"\w* in \w feasts|strong="H4580"\w*, they \w gnashed|strong="H2786"\w* upon me with their \w teeth|strong="H8127"\w*.

\w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, how long wilt thou look \w on|strong="H7200"\w*? \w rescue|strong="H7725"\w* my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* from their \w destructions|strong="H7722"\w*, my \w darling|strong="H3173"\w* from the \w lions|strong="H3715"\w*.\f + \fr 35.17 \ft darling: Heb. only one\f*

I will give thee \w thanks|strong="H3034"\w* in the \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w*: I will \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* thee among \w much|strong="H6099"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.\f + \fr 35.18 \ft much: Heb. strong\f*

Let not them that are mine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* \w wrongfully|strong="H8267"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* over me: \add neither\add* let them \w wink|strong="H7169"\w* with the \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* that \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* me without a \w cause|strong="H2600"\w*.\f + \fr 35.19 \ft wrongfully: Heb. falsely\f*

For they \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* not \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*: but they \w devise|strong="H2803"\w* \w deceitful|strong="H4820"\w* \w matters|strong="H1697"\w* against \add them that are\add* \w quiet|strong="H7282"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

Yea, they opened their \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w wide|strong="H7337"\w* against me, \add and\add* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Aha|strong="H1889"\w*, \w aha|strong="H1889"\w*, our \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* hath \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \add it\add*.
\add This\add* thou hast \w seen|strong="H7200"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: keep not \w silence|strong="H2790"\w*: O \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, be not \w far|strong="H7368"\w* from me.

Stir \w up|strong="H5782"\w* thyself, and \w awake|strong="H6974"\w* to my \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, \add even\add* unto my \w cause|strong="H7379"\w*, my \w God|strong="H0430"\w* and my \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*.

\w Judge|strong="H8199"\w* me, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, according to thy \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*; and let them not \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* over me.

Let them not \w say|strong="H0559"\w* in their \w hearts|strong="H3820"\w*, \w Ah|strong="H1889"\w*, so would we have \w it|strong="H5315"\w*: let them not \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, We have swallowed him \w up|strong="H1104"\w*.\f + \fr 35.25 \ft Ah…: Heb. Ah, ah, our soul\f*

Let them be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w* and brought to \w confusion|strong="H2659"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w* that \w rejoice|strong="H8056"\w* at mine \w hurt|strong="H7451"\w*: let them be \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* with \w shame|strong="H1322"\w* and \w dishonour|strong="H3639"\w* that \w magnify|strong="H1431"\w* \add themselves\add* against me.

Let them shout for \w joy|strong="H7442"\w*, and be \w glad|strong="H8055"\w*, that \w favour|strong="H2655"\w* my righteous \w cause|strong="H6664"\w*: yea, let them \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w*, Let the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* be \w magnified|strong="H1431"\w*, which hath \w pleasure|strong="H2655"\w* in the \w prosperity|strong="H7965"\w* of his \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*.\f + \fr 35.27 \ft righteous…: Heb. righteousness\f*
And my \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* shall \w speak|strong="H1897"\w* of thy \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w* \add and\add* of thy \w praise|strong="H8416"\w* all the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* long.
